DOC.brief_summary: A one month multi-dose study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of 3 intravenous infusions of RSLV-132 in subjects with inactive to mild SLE.
DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study of RSLV-132 in Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.criteria: Stable SLE with no anticipated change in medications for the next 60 days Other biologic drugs
